inspire.heroText: YOU have a powerful story to share. Your story can help women and girls around the world. Please help build our inspiring collection of stories by, sharing some aspects of your journey to empowerment

quotes.girlsFight: The fight for girls won't be won by girls alone

getInTouch.title: Get in Touch
getInTouch.text: We handle your shares with care and protect your data safely.

resources.blurp: Girls' Globe amplifies the voices of activists, advocates and experts on gender equality, human rights and social justice.
Malala and Ziauddin Yousafzai founded Malala Fund in 2013 to champion every girl’s right to 12 years of free, safe, quality education.

GTHQ covers a range of topics that are relevant to women today, like feminism, women’s reproductive rights, the representation of women in film & TV, diversity in the media, and gender equality measures.

ourStory.body: All change starts with an idea and a conversation. We give you the idea that will start a conversation! Women in the middle east feel that they’re alone and that feminist movements are not very related to them because they have a different society. Women will have the ability to stand together and learn from each other. Men will know that there’s a problem and they can do something about it

ourMission.body: This website gives women the ability to read stories and learn from each other.Understand that what they’re going through is not just a special case.They will also be able to reach help through resources

ourTeam.body: We are a team of individuals, who together will achieve goals, by helping women.

getInTouch.subheader: We would love to hear your feedback and suggestions
